about_this_item: Three tubes of Fresh Mint flavored Sensodyne Pronamel Gentle Whitening Enamel Toothpaste for Sensitive Teeth
#1 Dentist Recommended toothpaste for Protecting and Strengthening Enamel
Exclusive fresh mint flavor provides a refreshing feeling to your teeth
Enamel strengthening toothpaste that offers effective protection against cavities
Teeth whitening toothpaste specially formulated to gently polish away stains

title: So much help for tooth sensitivity
content: Ordered after recommendation from my dentist. I had my wisdom teeth removed and it left too much of my teeth exposed where the gum was cut. Dentist said I need to wait for the gum to heal over and to try this in the meantime for the sensitivity. It worked perfectly! No more issues from hot or cold foods.

title: Gentle care for sensitive teeth
content: I've been using Sensodyne Pronamel Gentle Teeth Whitening Enamel Toothpaste for a while now, and there are several aspects I appreciate about it. Firstly, it's specifically designed for sensitive teeth, which is a big plus for me. The gentle formula doesn't cause discomfort, yet it still effectively whitens teeth over time.
